attributes.action: Tell Sadiq Khan to rethink his support for the Garden Bridge over the Thames
attributes.background: Despite times of austerity, our mayor of London is still giving his overall support to a Garden Bridge over the Thames set to cost £175 million to build and £3.5 million a year to maintain. How is this fair when we need houses built, better education for our children and a better NHS?

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
